speaker: Clinician
text: So, when you mentioned missing a dose last week, did your daughter help you get back on track with the warfarin schedule?

speaker: Patient
text: Yeah, she did. I, uh, sometimes get mixed up with all the pills, but she set up one of those, uh, pill organizers for me.

speaker: Clinician
text: That's good to hear. And, um, have you had any trouble with the INR checks? I know it's a bit of a hassle to come in so often.

speaker: Patient
text: It's been okay, I guess. My daughter drives me, so that helps. But, uh, sometimes I worry about the numbers being off.

speaker: Clinician
text: I understand. It's important to keep them stable, especially with your kidney function in mind. Have you noticed any unusual bruising or bleeding?

speaker: Patient
text: No, not really. Just the usual, you know, if I bump into something. But nothing out of the ordinary.
